Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1155 BATTERY STREET, SAN FRANCISCO, California, 94111, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Levi Strauss & Co is involved in designing, marketing, and selling products that include jeans, casual and dresses pants, tops, shorts, skirts, jackets, footwear, and related accessories directly or through third parties and licensees for men, women, and children under Levi's, Dockers, Signature by Levi Strauss & Co. and Denizen brands. The company manages its business according to three regional segments: the Americas, which is the key revenue driver; Europe; and Asia.

value.name: Elizabeth Oneill
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
